title: Terske turns your thru axle into a portable crank, lock ring, or pedal wrench
content:
Depending on who you talk to, one of the arguments against the Centerlock rotor standard is the need for a big, bulky tool in case your rotor ever comes loose on a ride. We’ve seen it happen, and it can ruin a ride. Fortunately, the problem can now easily be solved with the new Terske Travel […]
